quote: Madness is the emergency exit. You can just step outside, and close the door on all those dreadful things that happened. You can lock them away... forever.
In my opinion, the existence of life is a highly overrated phenomenon.
Speak quickly! I am aching to destroy you!
In brightest day, in blackest night, no evil shall escape my sight. Let those who worship evil’s might, beware my power - Green Lantern’s light!
We plan for days and days and when the time comes, we proceed to improvise.
I cannot preach hate and warfare when I am a disciple of peace and love!
Never compromise. Not even in the face of Armageddon.
You asked for my help. That’s all that matters.
Once you realize what a joke everything is, being the Comedian is the only thing that makes sense.
No! Not all the blades in Asgard, Not all the power in the universe shall hold me now!
What do you think the "A" on my head stands for? France?
It's not who I am underneath, but what I do that defines me.
The future is worth it. All the pain. All the tears. The future is worth the fight.
The real crime would be not to finish what we started.
The greatest power on Earth is the magnificent power we all of us possess... the power of the human brain!
I hope justice is found here today... before justice finds you.
